1.Title: About me
1.Description: Hi, I am Jelle Max, a prospective data scientist currently studying at Howest. I am very passionate about AI, but in my free time I also love everything about cars and motorcycles. I am familiar with a lot of AI algorithms across machine learning, deep learning and reinforcement learning.

1.Title: HDC Latin
1.Description: During this one year in latin, I found out that language isn't really my strong suite. I did love the language, but I wasn't good at it.

2.Title: HDC Economy
2.Description: After my experience with latin, I decided to switch to economics. I was better suited for this, but it was still not a perfect match.

3.Title: Miniemeninstituut Commerce
3.Description: After my 2 years at HDC, I switched to Miniemeninstituut. The primary reason for this, was because I wanted to do something with informatics. Commerce was the perfect stepping stone to my next track, being IT management.

4.Title: Miniemeninstituut IT management
4.Description: During these two years, I learned a lot about informatics. I really loved it and had a lot of fun. The teachers were excellent and helped me find a suitable further career. I also got to experience an internship abroad thanks to my teachers.

5.Title: Howest AI & Business Professional
5.Description: After my studies at miniemeninstituut, I decided to go to Howest. I wanted to go to this school because it was said to be one of the hardest. I first entered thinking I would pursuit cyber security, but ended up choosing Artificial Intelligence & Business Professional as a specialization.

1.Title: Sint-kamillus, Bierbeek
1.Description: During this job, my main task was doing the call centre for internal personnel of Sint-Kamillus. The second part of my job consisted of doing maintenance on some applications and updating printer and camera passwords.

2.Title: Proximus, Brussels
2.Description: After having a student job as a programmer, my manager gave me the opportunity to join the data scientist team for my internship. During this internship I helped with reworking an old project and helping with the data cleaning process.

3.Title: Stag lodge stables, London
3.Description: During this internship, I created an administrative application and a website. The purpose of this, was to automate the appointment system.

4.Title: Bioplanet, Korbeek-lo
4.Description: This was my first student job, I had to fill the shelves and work at the cash register.

1.Title: Plant disease project
1.Description: This was my first pure ai project, we had to create a model that could predict the disease of a plant by giving it an image.

2.Title: Prophesea price lstm project
2.Description: Prophesea was the first time we worked for a real business, we had to work together with a real company to create an lstm model that could predict price fluctuations.

1.Title: Bachelor thesis Dimensionality reduction
1.Description: During my last year at Howest, I had to write a bachelor thesis. I decided to write my thesis on different dimensionality reduction techniques. It was a challenging topic since I had no experience on the matter. I had a lot of struggles while working on this, but I found it very interesting. You can always see my progress, or result when I'm finished, here:

2.Title: Curriculum Vitae
2.Description: Are you already convinced? Please do check out my cv then (english version coming soon)!:

1.Title: Data scientist
1.Description: Data science is what I love the most. I love working with AI models, refining them and pursuing the 'optimal' model.

2.Title: Data analyst
2.Description: Data analyst is a little bit less up my ally, but still something I enjoy doing from time to time.

3.Title: Data engineer
3.Description: Data engineering is something I am not that interested in, nor that good in. I prefer to stay away from tasks that require a good amount of data engineering.
